TableSpec.Name: Exchange Rate Refresh Process
TableSpec.Description: Stores information about Currency Exchange Rate Refresh Process instances.
TableSpec.Author: Technical Training

TextField.Name: NAME
TextField.Description: The name of the parameter set.

TextField.Name: FIXERAPIACCESSKEY
TextField.Description: The Fixer API access key to fetch exchange rate information.

EnumField.Name: DATECODE
EnumField.Description: The date to use when fetching exchange rate information.

DateField.Name: HISTORICALDATE
DateField.Description: The date to use when getting rates for an historical date.

CheckConstraint.Name: USR_CK_HISTORICALDATEVALID
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: (DATECODE = 0 and HISTORICALDATE is null) or (DATECODE = 1 and HISTORICALDATE is not null)

CheckConstraint.Name: USR_CK_HISTORICALDATEVALIDRANGE
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: HISTORICALDATE is null or (1999 <= datepart(year, HISTORICALDATE) and HISTORICALDATE <= getdate())
